name: Sayang
greetingText: HAPPIEST OF BIRTHDAYS! I LOVE YOU SO DAMN MUCH
textInChatBox: Everything about you is just so wonderfully made. Every part of you is absolutely beautiful in every way possible...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised I wanted to do something
bigTextPart1: Here are the things you truly LOVE
wishText: May you have the greatest of life ahead of you.
outroText: I love you so much. Please don't stop being the way you are.
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
